title: I Have bug when it comes to Competitive game mode(Clash)
body:
Each time i press create a team it gives me a error tryed on other acc same thing happends.
Somebody help me i cant get inved into team or anything.

replies.body: It's most likely giving you that error since you don't meet the Honor Rank requirements for Clash. Since Clash is still in beta some of those error messages don't seem to be giving the best message =\ . Check out all of the details on how Clash works over in the [**Clash Discord**](https://discord.gg/league-clash-beta)!
